title: Screaming in Silence
description: After being moved from group home to group home, I found myself firmly in the grasps of one of the most ruthless boys I’d met. Clarke Denshire took me under his wing and showed me how to survive. And I did survive.My first assignment sends me into the claws of Fairwater Academy. Day one and I manage to get on the bad side of a beautiful boy from the wrong side of the tracks. It’s a skill of mine, and now my job is harder than I could imagine to achieve. Backed up by his bastard son of a billionaire bestie and the mafia boy, I find their game to break me makes me feel more alive than I have in years.I don’t want to just survive, I want to live and powered against these men I’m gambling with my life, and my heart. Game on.
author: W I Night
